meanings.definition: Serving as a means or agency
meanings.sent1: Her instrumental role in the project ensured its success.
meanings.sent2: The calculator was instrumental in solving the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight was instrumental in finding the lost keys in the dark.
meanings.sent4: His persuasive skills were instrumental in convincing the team to agree.
meanings.sent5: The map was instrumental in guiding us through the forest.

meanings.definition: Relating to or performed on a musical instrument
meanings.sent1: The instrumental music played softly in the background.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her instrumental skills on the piano every day.
meanings.sent3: The instrumental sounds filled the concert hall with joy.
meanings.sent4: His instrumental performance on the guitar captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The instrumental melody echoed through the room beautifully.

meanings.definition: Essential in helping to achieve a goal
meanings.sent1: Good communication is instrumental in building strong relationships.
meanings.sent2: Teamwork is instrumental in completing the project on time.
meanings.sent3: His positive attitude was instrumental in lifting everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent4: Proper planning is instrumental in reaching our objectives.
meanings.sent5: Her dedication was instrumental in reaching the top of the mountain.
